original_text: Every morning they stood in their places to thank the Lord and to praise him. They did the same thing every evening. Every morning they stood in their places to thank the Lord and to praise him. They did the same thing every evening.
korean_text: 아침과 저녁마다 서서 여호와께 감사하고 찬송하며

sentences.original_text: Every morning they stood in their places
sentences.korean_translation: 매일 아침 그들은 그들의 자리에 서서

sentences.original_text: They did the same thing every evening
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 매일 저녁 같은 일을 했습니다
